message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The symptoms of sore throat, fever, and tender nodules on the shins are consistent with erythema nodosum. Cutaneous polyarteritis nodosa and Henoch-Schönlein purpura both involve skin lesions with vasculitis, but they do not typically present with sore throat and tonsillitis. Erythema induratum involves painful nodules on the legs, but it is typically associated with tuberculosis and presents with ulceration.
